official_title: To transfer the parcel known as the Battle Mountain Community Pasture, located in Lander County, Nevada.
short_title: Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1989

summary.text: Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1989 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Battle Mountain Community Pasture, Lander County, Nevada, to the Pershing County Water Conservation District.

titles.title: Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1989
To transfer the parcel known as the Battle Mountain Community Pasture, located in Lander County, Nevada.
